data.chText: 聚集；集合
data.enText: come/bring together

data.chText: 聚集；集合；召集
data.enText: to come together, or bring people together, in one place to form a group

data.chText: 很快就聚集起了一群人。
data.enText: A crowd soon gathered.

data.chText: 你们都围过来好吗？我有事要告诉你们。
data.enText: Can you all gather round ? I've got something to tell you.

data.chText: 全家人聚集在雷的家中。
data.enText: The whole family gathered together at Ray's home.

data.chText: 他的支持者聚集在主广场上。
data.enText: His supporters gathered in the main square.

data.chText: 他们都围到电视机旁。
data.enText: They were all gathered round the TV.

data.chText: 召集了一大群人在制片厂外面。
data.enText: A large crowd was gathered outside the studio.

data.chText: 孩子们被聚集在一间屋子里。
data.enText: The kids were gathered together in one room.

data.chText: 收拢，归拢（分散的东西）
data.enText: to bring things together that have been spread around

data.chText: 人们慢慢地收起他们的行李离开了大厅。
data.enText: People slowly gathered their belongings and left the hall.

data.chText: 他整理文件时我就在一旁等待。
data.enText: I waited while he gathered up his papers.

data.chText: 收集
data.enText: collect

data.chText: 搜集，收集（情报）
data.enText: to collect information from different sources

data.chText: 侦探们花了数月时间搜集证据。
data.enText: Detectives have spent months gathering evidence.

data.chText: 采集（植物、水果等）
data.enText: to collect plants, fruit, etc. from a wide area

data.chText: 采集野花
data.enText: to gather wild flowers

data.chText: 庄稼；收成
data.enText: crops/harvest

data.chText: 收割；收获
data.enText: to pick or cut and collect crops to be stored

data.chText: 已是八月下旬，庄稼都妥善收割完毕。
data.enText: It was late August and the harvest had been safely gathered in.

data.chText: 相信；理解
data.enText: believe/understand

data.chText: 认为；猜想；推断；理解

before.enText: not used in the progressive tenses

data.enText: to believe or understand that sth is true because of information or evidence you have

data.chText: 我猜你想要见我。
data.enText: I gather (that) you wanted to see me.

data.chText: 我从信中了解到你并不喜欢你的工作。
data.enText: I gather from your letter that you're not enjoying your job.

data.chText: “已经耽搁了。”“那是我预料中的事。”
data.enText: ‘There's been a delay.’ ‘I gathered that.’

data.chText: “她不会来了。”“我也这么认为。”
data.enText: ‘She won't be coming.’ ‘So I gather.’

data.chText: 我想你是个体经营吧。
data.enText: You're self-employed, I gather.

data.chText: 据我了解，他卷入了一场争斗之中。
data.enText: As far as I can gather , he got involved in a fight.

data.chText: 从我了解的情况看，还存在某种问题。
data.enText: From what I can gather , there's been some kind of problem.

data.chText: 增加
data.enText: increase

data.chText: 增加（速度、力量等）
data.enText: to increase in speed, force, etc.

data.chText: 卡车加快了速度。
data.enText: The truck gathered speed .

data.chText: 20世纪80年代绿色运动的势头开始增强。
data.enText: During the 1980s the green movement gathered momentum .

data.chText: 数千台这样的机器都尘封在仓库里。
data.enText: Thousands of these machines are gathering dust (= not being used) in stockrooms.

data.chText: 云层；黑暗
data.enText: of clouds/darkness

data.chText: 逐渐增加；积聚
data.enText: to gradually increase in number or amount

data.chText: 暴风雨乌云正在聚集。
data.enText: The storm clouds were gathering.

data.chText: 天色越来越暗的一个冬日下午
data.enText: the gathering gloom of a winter's afternoon

data.chText: 衣服
data.enText: clothing

data.chText: 收紧，拢起（衣服）
data.enText: to pull a piece of clothing tighter to your body

data.chText: 他用披风把身子裹紧。
data.enText: He gathered his cloak around him.

data.chText: 她提起裙摆就跑。
data.enText: She gathered up her skirts and ran.

data.chText: 给…打褶子
data.enText: to pull parts of a piece of clothing together in folds and sew them in place

data.chText: 她穿了一条腰部打褶的裙子。
data.enText: She wore a skirt gathered (in) at the waist.

data.chText: 拉住某人
data.enText: hold sb

data.chText: 拉近；拥抱
data.enText: to pull sb towards you and put your arms around them

data.chText: 她把孩子拉过来紧紧抱在怀里。
data.enText: She gathered the child in her arms and held him close.

data.chText: 他把她拉到身边。
data.enText: He gathered her to him.

data.chText: 做好准备
data.enText: prepare yourself

data.chText: 聚集，积聚（力量、精神等）；使做好准备
data.enText: to prepare yourself to do sth that requires effort

data.chText: 我坐下片刻积蓄力量。
data.enText: I sat down for a moment to gather my strength.

data.chText: 门打开时她还勉强要自己集中精神。
data.enText: She was still trying to gather her thoughts together when the door opened.

data.chText: 幸运的是，这短暂的拖延给了他喘息的时间。
data.enText: Fortunately the short delay gave him time to gather himself.
a rolling stone gathers no moss

data.chText: 滚石不生苔，频迁不聚财
data.enText: a person who moves from place to place, job to job, etc. does not have a lot of money, possessions or friends but is free from responsibilities

data.text: collect ♦ gather ♦ accumulate ♦ run sth up ♦ amass

data.chText: 以上各词均含收集、聚积、积累之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to get more of sth over a period of time, or to increase in quantity over a period of time.
collect

data.chText: 指收集、采集、聚积、积累：
data.enText: to bring things or information together from different people or places; to gradually increase in amount in a place

data.chText: 我们一直从各种渠道收集资料。
data.enText: We've been collecting data from various sources.

data.chText: 房间的角落里积满了灰尘。
data.enText: Dirt had collected in the corners of the room.

data.chText: 作为爱好收藏物品用collect：
data.enText: People sometimes collect things of a particular type as a hobby.

data.chText: 集邮
data.enText: to collect stamps
gather

data.chText: 指收拢、归拢（分散的东西），搜集、收集（情报）：
data.enText: to bring things together that have been spread around; to collect information from different sources

data.chText: 他整理文件时我就在一旁等待。
data.enText: I waited while he gathered up his papers.

data.chText: 侦探花了数月时间搜集证据。
data.enText: Detectives have spent months gathering evidence.

data.chText: 用collect还是gather？
collect和gather均可指收集资料、情报或证据。将分散在附近的东西、财物或文件收拢用gather；从不同的人或分散的地方收集样品用collect。
data.enText: Both collect and gather can be used in the same way to talk about bringing together data, information or evidence. When talking about things, gather is used with words like things , belongings or papers when the things are spread around within a short distance. Collect is used for getting examples of sth from different people or places that are physically separated.
collect or gather?
accumulate

data.chText: 指积累、聚积，（数量）逐渐增加：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) to gradually get more and more of sth over a period of time; to gradually increase in number or quantity over a period of time

data.chText: 我好像已经积存了很多书。
data.enText: I seem to have accumulated a lot of books.

data.chText: 债务开始增加。
data.enText: Debts began to accumulate.
run sth up

data.chText: 指积欠（账款、债务）、累积（损失）：
data.enText: ( rather informal ) to allow a bill, debt or loss to reach a large total

data.chText: 她已经欠下了一大笔电话费。
data.enText: She had run up a huge phone bill.

data.chText: run up几乎总是与bill、debt或loss等词连用。
data.enText: Run up is nearly always used with bill , debt or loss .
amass

data.chText: 指大量积累、积聚（尤指金钱、债务或情报）：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) to collect sth in large quantities, especially money, debts or information

data.chText: 他靠开采银矿积累了一笔财富。
data.enText: He amassed a fortune from silver mining.
to collect/gather/accumulate/amass data/evidence/information
to accumulate/run up/amass debts
to accumulate/run up losses
to accumulate/amass a fortune
Dirt/dust/debris collects/gathers/accumulates.
to gradually/slowly collect/gather/accumulate/amass sth

ex.chText: 男生和女生集合起来去野餐。
ex.enText: The boys and girls gathered for a picnic.

ex.chText: 出事地点聚集了一群人。
ex.enText: A crowd gathered at the scene of the accident.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，可指人和物，侧重于围绕某个中心而聚集。

ex.chText: 一大群人聚集在办公大楼前面。
ex.enText: A large crowd assembled in front of the office building.

ex.chText: 她收集了一些自己最喜欢的专辑。
ex.enText: She has assembled a collection of her favourite albums.

synonyms.bx: 常指为某种目的聚集在一起。

ex.chText: 人群开始聚集在事故现场。
ex.enText: A crowd was starting to collect around the spot of the accident.

ex.chText: 越来越多的人开始聚集在大使馆前面。
ex.enText: More and more people began to collect in front of the embassy.

synonyms.bx: 指人在某一处集中或逐渐地聚集成群。

ex.chText: 教学小组每周开会一次。
ex.enText: The teaching group convenes every week.

ex.chText: 总统召集部长（开会）讨论这个问题。
ex.enText: The president convened (a meeting of) his ministers to discuss the matter.

synonyms.bx: 指聚集起来或召集有关人员举行正式会议。

data.enText: a rolling stone gathers no moss

data.chText: 滚石不生苔，频迁不聚财
data.enText: a person who moves from place to place, job to job, etc. does not have a lot of money, possessions or friends but is free from responsibilities

trans: 集中（精力、思想等）；鼓起（勇气）；振作（精神）

tr: sewing consisting of small folds or puckers made by pulling tight a thread in a line of stitching

example: Journals are accumulating in my office
I gather you have not done your homework
Our ancestors gathered nuts in the Fall

tr: draw together into folds or puckers

example: she gathered her shawl around her shoulders
We assembled in the church basement
Let's gather in the dining room
get together all those who are interested in the project

value.def: If people gather somewhere or if someone gathers people somewhere, they come together in a group.

example.ex: In the evenings, we gathered around the fireplace and talked...
example.tran: 晚上，我们聚在火炉边聊天。

example.ex: The man signalled for me to gather the children together.
example.tran: 那人示意让我将孩子们召集起来。

value.def: If you gather things, you collect them together so that you can use them.

example.ex: I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night...
example.tran: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

example.ex: She stood up and started gathering her things together.
example.tran: 她起身开始收拾自己的物品。

example.ex: When Sutcliffe had gathered up his papers, he went out...
example.tran: 萨克利夫收齐了他的文件便出去了。

example.ex: He gathered the leaves up off the ground.
example.tran: 他将地上的树叶全部收了起来。

value.def: If you gather information or evidence, you collect it, especially over a period of time and after a lot of hard work.

example.ex: ...a private detective using a hidden tape recorder to gather information...
example.tran: 用暗藏的录音机搜集证据的私家侦探

example.ex: This would help the prosecutor gather evidence against him which could be used in court.
example.tran: 这将有利于控方律师搜集对他不利的证据以在法庭上指控他。

value.tran: （尤指经过一段时间的辛苦工作）收集，搜集（情报、证据等）

value.def: If something gathers speed, momentum, or force, it gradually becomes faster or more powerful.

example.ex: Demands for his dismissal have gathered momentum in recent weeks...
example.tran: 最近几周，要求将他解职的呼声越来越高。

example.ex: The raft gathered speed as the current dragged it toward the falls.
example.tran: 水流将木筏拽向瀑布，木筏的速度越来越快。

value.tran: 逐渐增加（速度、动力、力量等）

value.def: When you gather something such as your strength, courage, or thoughts, you make an effort to prepare yourself to do something.

example.ex: You must gather your strength for the journey.
example.tran: 你必须为这次行程打起精神来。

example.ex: She was gathering up her courage to approach him when he called to her.
example.tran: 他叫她的时候，她正在鼓足勇气走近他。

value.tran: 集中（精力、思想等）；鼓起（勇气）；振作（精神）

value.def: You use gather in expressions such as 'I gather' and 'as far as I can gather' to introduce information that you have found out, especially when you have found it out in an indirect way.

example.ex: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge...
example.tran: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

example.ex: 'He speaks English,' she said to Graham. 'I gathered that.'...
example.tran: “他会说英语，”她对格雷厄姆说，“我料到了。”

example.ex: From what I could gather, he was trying to raise money by organising festivals.
example.tran: 据我所知，他想通过举办节庆活动来筹款。

value.tran: （用于引出已发现的信息，尤其是间接获得的信息）据我所知，据我了解

value.def: If you gather fabric or cloth, you make a row of very small folds in it by sewing a thread through it and then pulling the thread tight.

example.ex: Gather the skirt at the waist.

trans: 聚集写；集中写；集中发送；集写；集中写入
收集数据；收集资料；搜集数据
接腾空球；收集；尽量收集进来
搜集信息；收集信息；收集消息；收集资料；搜集资料
收集；收拢；归拢；集中（精力、思想等）；鼓起（勇气）；振作（精神）
收集数据；收集资料；搜集数据
